articles.author: Antoinette Tyrrell
articles.title: Portugal Imposes Quarantine Restrictions on UK Travellers - European Views
articles.description: Portugal imposes travel quarantine restrictions on UK travelers as cases of the Delta Variant surge in the country.
articles.content:
Portugal has emerged in recent days as the epicentre of the Delta variant of the Covid-19 virus in Europe as cases of the variant surge across the country.

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Mask-free and 'low risk', Italy welcomes milestone - New Straits Times
articles.description: ROME: All of Italy became a mask-free, "low-risk" zone for coronavirus Monday, marking a dramatic milestone for the first European country to be hit by the global pandemic in February 2020.
